name: Monthly TDS Payable
query:
select 
a.posting_date as "Posting Date",
a.account as "Account:Link/Account:100",
a.parent_account,
a.debit as "Debit",
a.credit as "Credit",
a.total_invoice_amount as "Total Invocie Amount",
a.company as "Company:Link/Company:100",
b.voucher_type as "Vourche Type",
b.voucher_no as "Voucher No",
b.party_type as "Party type",
b.Party_Name as "Party Name",
b.Pan "Pan No.",
a.JV as "User Remark"

from


(select 
gl.voucher_type,
gl.voucher_no,
gl.party_type,
(CASE WHEN gl.party_type='Supplier' or gl.party_type='Customer' THEN gl.party END) as "Party_Name",
(CASE
    WHEN gl.party_type='Supplier' THEN s.pan
    WHEN gl.party_type='Customer' THEN c.pan_no END) as "Pan"
from `tabGL Entry` as gl left join `tabSupplier` as s
on gl.party=s.name
left join `tabCustomer` as c
on gl.party=c.name
where (gl.party_type="Supplier" or gl.party_type="Customer" or gl.party_type="")) as b

left join



(select 
gl.posting_date,
gl.account,
b.parent_account,
gl.debit,
gl.credit,
gl.voucher_type,
gl.voucher_no,
pi.total_invoice_amount,
gl.party_type,
gl.company,
(CASE WHEN gl.party_type='Supplier' or gl.party_type='Customer' or gl.party_type='' THEN gl.party END) as "Party",
(CASE
    WHEN gl.party_type='Supplier' THEN s.pan
    WHEN gl.party_type='Customer' THEN c.pan_no END) as "pan",
(CASE
    WHEN gl.voucher_type='Journal Entry' THEN j.user_remark END) as "JV"
from `tabGL Entry` as gl left join `tabSupplier` as s
on gl.party=s.name
left join `tabCustomer` as c
on gl.party=c.name 
left join `tabAccount` as b
on gl.account=b.name
left join `tabPurchase Invoice` as pi
on gl.voucher_no=pi.name
left join `tabJournal Entry` as j
on gl.voucher_no=j.name) as a 
on a.voucher_no=b.voucher_no


where (date(a.posting_date) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) and a.parent_account=%(parent_account)s and  a.company=%(company)s


group by a.account,a.parent_account,a.company,a.voucher_type,a.voucher_no
